Package commands

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command
    I've used Strategy design pattern in all of the ConcreteCommands, so later when we'd like to use a different command (e.g: GUIDisplayer, SafeExitor, etc..) it will be really convenient.
    Displayer  
    Exit  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CLI
    Our Command Line Interface: Here we will show the user a simple console menu with a detailed explanation.
    ConsoleDisplayer
    Printing the current level to the console using ASCII to represent the game objects.
    ConsoleExitor
    In this Milestone, we just close the running CLI thread using this class.
    DisplayCommand  
    ExitCommand  
    IOFactory
    I've used this class in order not to write duplicate code in LoadCommand & SaveCommand.
    LoadCommand  
    MoveCommand  
    SaveCommand
    This class will provide the actual Saver for the file requested in O(1) time complexity, using a Factory design pattern.
